page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Introduction. -------------------------------------- Our area includes the Northern end of the{village}of Bassingham, the whole of the parish of Thurlby, part of the parish of Aubourn, half of the hamlet of Haddington,the S.E.corner of the parish of Swinderby and the N.E. corner of the parish of Norton Disney. Bassingham is the main village in the area with a total{population}of 850.Thurlby is a smaller village with a population about 100.Thurlby Moor is now home to the RAF. The River Witham runs through the middle of our area.Many{fish}are to be found here. There are several{farms}in our area.The agriculture is mainly arable. Crops grown include wheat, barley, oilseed rape, sugar beet and potatoes. --------------------------------------
